short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A gamified pomodoro + flow timer system in your browser where productivity becomes an adventure!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Think **your favorite monster collection game**, but for boosting focus! Focumon turns productivity into an adventure with a gamified Pomodoro and flow timer system. Collect and level up over 100 adorable pixel monsters by being productive with Focumon trainers from all over the world! Focumon is an all-in-one time management app + productivity game inspired by Forest and Habitica. It incorporates Pomodoro and the Third Time (Flowmodoro) techniques in a gamified multiplayer environment for instant motivation boosts!

Although you can use focumon.com directly on the website, it can be inconvenient to switch between tabs frequently. This Chrome extension solves the problem by opening up focumon.com in a standalone popup window to reduce navigation frustration!
